title: Claimed
description: Love heals all wounds…***Raven***I’m damaged goods. Broken beyond repair. He’ll never claim me now. Why would he still want me? Why would anyone? I’m not the girl he met, and I’ll never be her again. He’s all I have. What will I do when he leaves me just like everybody else has?***Gage***The saying goes, “before you embark on a journey of revenge, dig two graves.” I’ll need more than that. I promised to protect her, and I couldn’t. If she runs fast and far away from me, I wouldn’t blame her. But I’m still selfish. I’ll move Heaven, Hell, and everything in between, to make sure they pay for what they did to her. I don’t want to lose her. I can’t. She’s mine. **Intended for mature audiences. These books explore serious themes that may be considered triggers for some.**
author: Alana Sapphire
